seg.seg: May he in a large assembly speak about those things!
May he in a large assembly speak about those things!

list.item: #M12# %4 a1 w(a)t ; k_uce sū weñī , tu /// %2 #6a %12 #6b %12 #6c %12 #6d %1 a2 sūtärnmāṣṣe ; orocce|wrocce ka ñ· , ·ū /// %2 #7a %12 #7b %12 #7c %12 #7d pälskoy|(pä)|lsko_i a3 anaiśai ; k_uce ṣṣāp no cau|ce_u , ṣäñ /// %2 #8a %12 #8b %12 #8c %12 #8d āklu|(ā)|klu a4 k_use śasträ ; kärsālle ket , mā ārth ś(abdh) /// %1 #9a %12 #9b %12 #9c %11 a5 kärso_i 9 #9d tusā prekṣälle ; ṣṣek pälsko /// %4 #10a %12 #10b %12 #10c %2 a6 sū śasträ ; miko_u eśne , cok rāmtä 10 #10d k_use nno /// %10 #11a %12 #11b %12 #11c %6 a7 cents no mā , tākoy-me|tako_i-me #11d mänt yaknesa|yäknesā ynāñm ; i /// %6 #12a %12 #12b %12 #12c %6 a8 ntsa rekī , we e /// %1 #12d b1 kṣ· no tak· /// #13d b2 mänt ra k_use prukṣtär ; aklu ra n(o) , aiśämñe #14a /// %12 #14b %12 #14c %10 b3 krentä #14d wertsyaine wrottsai ; weñī pī sū , tontsa pä(st) #15a /// %12 #15b %12 #15c %12 #15d reki|re|kī b4 mā astre ynañmā mäsketrä amā(skai) #16a /// %12 #16b %12 #16c %7 b5 yaitor , wawlawar : #16d k_ucene ālyeṅkä ; /// %7 #17a %12 #17b %12 #17c b6 ra śabdhsa yaitor ; apaśabdh no , mā weñ(i) #17d /// %12 #18a %12 #18b %12 #18c b7 pelaikne astre ; rekī stāmä , /// %3 #18d % b8 k·· mā nta weñi permā /// #19d

b3 May he in a large assembly speak about those things!

[[IDP]]: THT 134, [[THT|TITUS]]: THT 134.
Edition: [[TochSprR(B) II]]: 67-68.
Translation: b3 [[Peyrot, ToSu]]: 361; b5 [[Thomas 1952]]: 16.

a1 w(a)_t\ k_uce sū weñī t[u] /// a2 sū_t_arnmāṣṣe wrocce ka ñ· [·ū] /// a3 lsko_i anaiśai k_uce ṣṣāp no ce_u _ṣ_añ\ /// a4 klu k_use śast_r_a _k_arsālle ket mā ārth\ ś· /// a5 _k_arso_i 9 tusā pre_k_ṣ_alle ṣṣek _p_alsk[o] /// a6 sū śast_r_a miko_u eśne cok rām_t_a 10 k_use nno /// a7 cents no mā tako_i-me _m_ant yäkn[e]sā ynāñ[m] i /// a8 ntsa rekī we e /// b1 kṣ· n[o] tak· /// b2 _m_ant ra k_use pruk_ṣ_t_a_r\ [a]klu r[a] n(o) [ai]_ś_amñe /// b3 kren_t_a wertsyaine wrottsai weñī pī sū tontsa _p_a /// b4 kī mā astre ynañ_mā _m_asket_r_a amā /// b5 yaitor wawlawa_r\ : k_ucene ālyeṅ[_k_a] /// b6 ra śabdhsa yaito_r\ apaśabdh no mā w[eñ](i) /// b7 pelaikne astre rekī s_tā_m_a /// b8 k·· mā nta weñi permā ///
